awd_titl_txt: Travel Grant to Attend XIXth Symposium on Advanced Problems and Methods in Fluid Mechanics
awd_abstract_narration: This grant is for International Travel Support.  An invited lecture             is to be given by the grantee at the XIXth. Symposium on Advanced               Problems and Methods in Fluid, Mechanics, Warsaw, Poland,                       September 3-8, 1989.  The grantee will also act as session                      chairman at the symposium.  In addition, he is to spend ten                     days in pursuit of a collaborative research effort in Warsaw                    at no additional expense to this grant.                                                                                                                         The topic of the lecture and collaborative research is the                      effect of ambient fluid stratification on the wake                              characteristics of blunt obstacles.//
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: UNIVERSITY OF NOTRE DAME DU LAC
